text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One afternoon following a long day of<n>work, I return to my
room, only to<n>realize something was amiss.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It was right on my collar, as per<n>regulations... Did I drop it<n>
somewhere? I'd better find it, quickly!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I search frantically for my badge up<n>and down the entire
campus, but no<n>luck...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maybe it fell through a crack or<n>something, I wonder, as my
eyes<n>strain to scan the ground.
Oof!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Forgive me! Are you all right? I hope<n>you've suffered no
injury.
choice_data_list:
I should be the one to apologize. I wasn't
looking...

I should be the one to apologize. I wasn't
looking...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Please, we are both unharmed, and<n>that is all that matters!
But say...<n>you've the look of someone in a<n>terrible
predicament.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I watched as you stared so bleakly at<n>your feet. Might you
be in search of<n>some precious family heirloom?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I tell the kind student how I lost my<n>trainer badge and can't
find it<n>anywhere.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Your trainer badge! This is more dire<n>than I feared.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
No outsider is permitted to set foot on<n>the grounds of Tracen
Academy.<n>Without your insignia, the guards may<n>mistake
you for a trespasser...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Have you not heard the tales? There<n>once was a scoundrel
prowling the<n>school under the cover of night.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
With not a soul to trouble them in the<n>dark, quiet halls, the
villain chuckled in<n>victory.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: But just then, they heard it. Theclip-clop of approaching footsteps...They turned around to suddenly seethe wicked grin of... Tazuna!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hehe... I only kid!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Wise trainer, why not try checking<n>your pockets?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The strange suggestion takes me by<n>surprise, but I reach
into my pockets<n>all the same...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'd only just picked it up off the floor,<n>but to think I would
meet its owner so<n>soon. What luck!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Judging by your frightened panic and<n>lack of badge, I
surmised it to be<n>yours... How right I was!
choice_data_list: But when did you put it in my pocket?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
When I bumped into you. Sleight of<n>hand is a useful skill of
mine! Heh<n>heh, were you shocked?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps I should have simply handed<n>it over, rather than
scare you. I<n>couldn't help but take the chance for<n>a fun
surprise... Forgive me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's it! To make up for my<n>devilish trick, let me treat
you to a<n>meal. You're sure to be delighted!
choice_data_list: I really should be thanking you though...
I really should be thanking you though...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
All the thanks I need is for you to<n>accompany me for a meal!
Now, to the<n>cafeteria, my dear trainer!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Pray tell. Have you heard the news?<n>There are special items
on the menu<n>today—bread of all sorts!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You won't be wanting for buns with<n>the plethora here. And
greatest of all, a<n>delight to surpass even carrot bread...<n>
Double carrot bread!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I wonder which one you'd prefer... I<n>shall bring whatever
you like, so feel<n>free to tell me!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You must be famished after roving<n>the grounds in your long
search. I'm<n>certain a hearty meal will put you<n>back in
good spirits!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki helps take my mind off<n>everything until the
exhaustion from<n>searching for my badge melts away.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Tell me, Trainer, is it to your liking?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I took all your interests and likes into<n>account when I chose
that dessert,<n>you know?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Really?! YES! I did it!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ahem... Pardon me, I was overly<n>excited. Your satisfied face,
though—it<n>fills my heart with joy!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hahaha, I'd say you're the kindone for thinking so.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I didn't merely want to spend time<n>together—rather, I wanted
to provide<n>you with a splendidly pleasurable<n>experience.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
For I am Fuji Kiseki—the entertainer<n>who brings joy to all!
At least, that is<n>the ideal I wish to become.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: FUJIII! We've got an emergency! It's<n>horrible!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Oh, Biko! What distresses you so?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
It's the dorm TV. It's not working!<n>We all wanna watch the
evening<n>race... What do we do?!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Well, that certainly sounds horrible!<n>Fear not, I'm on my
way. You were<n>right to come find me, Biko!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ah! Fuji, there you are!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Come on, the day's so boooring<n>when you're not around!
Show us<n>some cool magic tricks again!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! Darling pony, it must be<n>unbearable. Go wait at the
dorm. I<n>shall hurry there in all haste!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I must be off, back to our<n>dormitory. Thank you for a
splendid<n>time!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Now then, until we meet again!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki flashes a charming smile<n>at me as she heads
off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If I remember right, she's the leader<n>of Ritto dorm. They
must all depend on<n>her, judging from what I just saw.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki, loved by all, wishes to<n>bring joy to everyone...
But I wonder<n>how she races.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before my imagination begins to go<n>wild, I double-check my
badge and<n>head home.
